betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Next you will create Hexafluorosilicic Acid which will be used in the next quest to finally get you Aluminum.

To create your Hexafluorosilicic Acid you will need to craft the following:
1 Bronze Mixer
1 Bronze Turbine
Power to run bronze turbine
§a§6
The recipe:
Any quartz Dust + 4000L Hydrogen Fluoride => [Mixer 16RU/t] => 3000L Hexafluorosilicic Acid + 2000L water
§e§b
Note:  You can use any quartz dust which includes Certus Quartz, Milky Quarts, glass dust, flint dust, etc
§f§6§a
To complete the quest collect in a drum:
1000L of Hexafluorosilicic Acid
§e
Warning:  Use a stainless steel drum to collect the fluids as you cannot control which fluid leaves the machine first.
